page.title: 13Family Life in Codnor 2
page.content: {A Typical Saturday - Sally-Ann Reeve {(Age 10) My dad gets up at 7.30am to go to work and I get up at 8am to make my mum egg on toast for her breakfast.My brother makes a cup of tea.We have our breakfast and then at 10am I go ballroom dancing with my partner Ben Cork. We have won lots of medals for dancing. When I come back at 11am I help my mum with the housework till noon when we get dinner ready. My dad comes home from work and says "You can definitely have your pocket money!" I cheer and run up and down. After dinner we go out to Ripley to do the shopping. Then I help to make the tea with my mum. After tea we go out. My brother and I have a drink of pop and some sweets and crisps, and my mum and dad have a drink of beer. Then at 11pm my brother and I go to bed.{SR
